data.description: Make tar.gz distribution from form db file
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Part of a 2167A bundle that automatically generates Make.PL README
    SVD and documentation module from a forms data base file. The
    doucmetation module is in accordance with a lighly tailored 2167A
    SVD DID. Test::STDmaker automatically updates version by comparing
    the contents of the new release with the contents of the previous
    release.

    Modules in Bundle

    Test::TestUtil

    Test::Tech

    DataPort::DataFile DataPort::FileType::FormDB

    Test::STDmaker ExtUtils::SVDmaker
